column1: Bangaon is a city and a municipality in North 24 Parganas district in the state of West Bengal
column2: India. It is the headquarters of the Bangaon subdivision.

column1: Bangaon is located at 23.07°N 88.82°E﻿ / 23.07; 88.82. It has an average elevation of 7 metres (22 feet).  Arsenic contamination is a major concern in this area.
